GROVE SMTP MAILER

Grove SMTP Mailer is a Simple and Open Source SMTP E-Mail Sender Written in Visual Basic by Hommerhart - Effect-7

Feature List:

Version 1.0

    Allows Multiple Attechment
    Allows Multiple Receivers
    Changeable Smtp port And Smtp adress
